statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_certifications_audits;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date, compliance_status FROM compliance_certifications_audits;
SELECT certification_id, certification_name, auditor_name FROM compliance_certifications_audits WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT auditor_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_certifications_audits WHERE certification_name LIKE 'ISO%';
SELECT * FROM compliance_certifications_audits ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_certifications_audits WHERE certification_name='ISO 9001';
SELECT certification_name, auditor_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_certifications_audits WHERE certification_id=1;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM compliance_certifications_audits WHERE certification_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_certifications_audits WHERE compliance_status='Pending' ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_certifications, MAX(certification_date) AS latest_certification_date FROM compliance_certifications_audits;
SELECT * FROM compliance_certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM compliance_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT certification_name FROM compliance_certifications;
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name, audit_result FROM audits WHERE audit_result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT certification_name, owner_id FROM compliance_certifications WHERE owner_id = '12345';
SELECT * FROM compliance_certifications
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM compliance_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, auditor_name, audit_result FROM audits WHERE audit_result = 'Passed'
SELECT certification_id, COUNT(certification_id) AS total_audits FROM audits GROUP BY certification_id
SELECT c.certification_name, a.audit_date, a.auditor_name FROM audits a INNER JOIN compliance_certifications c ON a.certification_id = c.certification_id
SELECT * FROM compliance_certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_type FROM compliance_certifications ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_reports WHERE report_type = 'Financial';
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name, audit_findings FROM audit_reports WHERE auditor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT assessment_name, risk_level, recommendations FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_level > 3 ORDER BY assessment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_certifications ORDER BY issue_date DESC, certification_name
SELECT certification_name, certification_type, issuing_organization FROM compliance_certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT report_name, audit_date, auditor_name FROM audit_reports WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT report_name, audit_findings FROM audit_reports WHERE audit_findings LIKE '%major findings%'
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name, risk_level FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_level > 3 ORDER BY risk_level DESC
SELECT * FROM compliance_certifications WHERE certification_agency = 'ISO'
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM compliance_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC
SELECT document_name, document_type, upload_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy'
SELECT * FROM audit_reports ORDER BY audit_date ASC
SELECT assessment_type, risk_level FROM risk_assessment
SELECT certification_id, certification_name, certification_date, expiration_date FROM compliance_certifications WHERE certification_agency = 'ISO' ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_reports WHERE audit_type = 'Financial' AND audit_date >= '2022-01-01' AND audit_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type, upload_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy' ORDER BY upload_date;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_type, risk_level, recommendation FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_level IN ('High', 'Medium') ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_certifications cc JOIN audit_reports ar ON cc.certification_id = ar.report_id WHERE cc.certification_date >= '2020-01-01' AND ar.audit_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date, organization_name FROM compliance_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT id, certification_name, compliance_type FROM compliance_certifications WHERE compliance_type='ISO';
SELECT document_name, document_type, upload_date FROM documents WHERE certification_id=2;
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name, result FROM audits WHERE auditor_name='John Doe' OR result='Passed';
SELECT * FROM compliance_certifications WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT organization_name, certification_date FROM compliance_certifications WHERE certification_name LIKE '%ISO%';
SELECT document_name, upload_date FROM documents ORDER BY upload_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE audit_type = 'Annual' AND result = 'Pass';

SELECT users.username, audits.auditor_name, compliance_certifications.certification_name FROM users JOIN audits ON users.id = audits.id JOIN compliance_certifications ON audits.certification_id = compliance_certifications.id;
